name: Multiverse Hub
description: A gravity-defying junction suspended in nothing. Pathways branch off in impossible geometries.
You hear footsteps echo before you take them. Lights flicker like memories that aren’t yours.
One portal hums differently — like it’s watching you back.

puzzle.description: You hear a voice — your own — whispering from every doorway at once. One portal pulses with that familiar doubt.
